description: Strawberry Margarita cocktail is a sweet, tart and delicious drink that will remind you of summer. This recipe calls for&nbsp;tequila, triple sec, agave nectar, and fresh strawberries. You have to try this one!
name: Strawberry Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth (about 30 seconds).
recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth (about 30 seconds).

recipeInstructions.name: Pour strawberry margarita into salted rim glass with ice cubes. Garnish with a whole strawberry.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour strawberry margarita into salted rim glass with ice cubes. Garnish with a whole strawberry.
